### 📺 视频题解  

![38.外观数列-仲耀晖.mp4](abb686e4-d06c-4ee0-bb5c-633d86df1767)
### 📖 文字题解
#### 方法一：遍历生成

**思路**

通过阅读题目，我们可以了解到所谓的「外观数列」，其实本质上只是依次统计字符串中连续相同字符的个数。

+ 例如字符串 ![\texttt{1112234445666} ](./p__texttt{1112234445666}_.png)  我们依次统计连续相同字符的个数为: *3* 个连续的字符 ![\texttt{1} ](./p__texttt{1}_.png) , *2* 个连续的 ![\texttt{1} ](./p__texttt{1}_.png) ，*1* 个连续的字符 ![\texttt{3} ](./p__texttt{3}_.png) ，*3* 个连续的字符 ![\texttt{4} ](./p__texttt{4}_.png) ，*1* 个连续的字符 ![\texttt{5} ](./p__texttt{5}_.png) ，*3* 个连续的字符 ![\texttt{6} ](./p__texttt{6}_.png) 。我们对其进行整理为 ![\texttt{(3)1(2)2(1)3(3)4(1)5(3)6} ](./p__texttt{_3_1_2_2_1_3_3_4_1_5_3_6}_.png) ，我们将括号内的数字也转换为字符串为 ![\texttt{312213341536} ](./p__texttt{312213341536}_.png) 。

**算法**

题目中给定的递归公式定义的数字字符串序列如下：

- ![\texttt{countAndSay(1)="1"} ](./p__texttt{countAndSay_1__=_"1"}_.png) ；

- ![\texttt{countAndSay(n)} ](./p__texttt{countAndSay_n_}_.png)  是对 ![\texttt{countAndSay(n-1)} ](./p__texttt{countAndSay_n-1_}_.png)  的描述，然后转换成另一个数字字符串。

我们定义字符串 *S_{i}* 表示 ![\texttt{countAndSay(i)} ](./p__texttt{countAndSay_i_}_.png) ，我们如果要求得 *S_{n}*，则我们需先求出 *S_{n-1}*，然后按照上述描述的方法生成，即从左到右依次扫描字符串 *S_{n-1}* 中连续相同的字符的最大数目，然后将字符的统计数目转化为数字字符串再连接上对应的字符。我们已知 *S_{1}* 为 ![\texttt{"1"} ](./p__texttt{"1"}_.png) ，我们按照上述方法依次生成 ![S_{2},S_{3},\ldots,S_{n-1},S_{n} ](./p__S_{2},S_{3},ldots,S_{n-1},S_{n}_.png)  即可。

**代码**

```C++ [sol1-C++]
class Solution {
public:
    string countAndSay(int n) {
        string prev = "1";
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) {
            string curr = "";
            int start = 0;
            int pos = 0;

            while (pos < prev.size()) {
                while (pos < prev.size() && prev[pos] == prev[start]) {
                    pos++;
                }
                curr += to_string(pos - start) + prev[start];
                start = pos;
            }
            prev = curr;
        }
        
        return prev;
    }
};
```

```Java [sol1-Java]
class Solution {
    public String countAndSay(int n) {
        String str = "1";
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) {
            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
            int start = 0;
            int pos = 0;

            while (pos < str.length()) {
                while (pos < str.length() && str.charAt(pos) == str.charAt(start)) {
                    pos++;
                }
                sb.append(Integer.toString(pos - start)).append(str.charAt(start));
                start = pos;
            }
            str = sb.toString();
        }
        
        return str;
    }
}
```

```C# [sol1-C#]
public class Solution {
    public string CountAndSay(int n) {
        string str = "1";
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) {
            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
            int start = 0;
            int pos = 0;

            while (pos < str.Length) {
                while (pos < str.Length && str[pos] == str[start]) {
                    pos++;
                }
                sb.Append(pos - start).Append(str[start]);
                start = pos;
            }
            str = sb.ToString();
        }
        
        return str;
    }
}
```

```Python [sol1-Python3]
class Solution:
    def countAndSay(self, n: int) -> str:
        prev = "1"
        for i in range(n-1):
            curr = ""
            pos = 0
            start = 0

            while pos < len(prev):
                while pos < len(prev) and prev[pos] == prev[start]:
                    pos += 1
                curr += str(pos - start) + prev[start]
                start = pos
            prev = curr
        
        return prev
```

```JavaScript [sol1-JavaScript]
var countAndSay = function(n) {
    let str = "1";
    for (let i = 2; i <= n; ++i) {
        const sb = [];
        let start = 0;
        let pos = 0;

        while (pos < str.length) {
            while (pos < str.length && str[pos] === str[start]) {
                pos++;
            }
            sb.push('' + (pos - start) + str[start]);
            start = pos;
        }
        str = sb.join('');
    }
    
    return str;
};
```

```go [sol1-Golang]
func countAndSay(n int) string {
    prev := "1"
    for i := 2; i <= n; i++ {
        cur := &strings.Builder{}
        for j, start := 0, 0; j < len(prev); start = j {
            for j < len(prev) && prev[j] == prev[start] {
                j++
            }
            cur.WriteString(strconv.Itoa(j - start))
            cur.WriteByte(prev[start])
        }
        prev = cur.String()
    }
    return prev
}
```

**复杂度分析**

- 时间复杂度：![O(N\timesM) ](./p__O_N_times_M__.png) ，其中 *N* 为给定的正整数，*M* 为生成的字符串中的最大长度。

- 空间复杂度：*O(M)*。其中 *M* 为生成的字符串中的最大长度。

#### 方法二：枚举查表

**思路与算法**

题目中给定的数量限制为 ![1\len\le30 ](./p__1_le_n_le_30_.png) ，由于数量很小，我们只需要依次生成前 *30* 个 ![\texttt{countAndSay} ](./p__texttt{countAndSay}_.png)  字符串并将其存储为静态数组，每次直接查询数组中的第 *n* 个元素即可。

**代码**

```C++ [sol2-C++]
class Solution {
public:
    string countAndSay(int n) {
        vector<string> arr = 
        {
            "","1","11","21","1211","111221","312211","13112221","1113213211","31131211131221","13211311123113112211","11131221133112132113212221","3113112221232112111312211312113211","1321132132111213122112311311222113111221131221","11131221131211131231121113112221121321132132211331222113112211","311311222113111231131112132112311321322112111312211312111322212311322113212221","132113213221133112132113311211131221121321131211132221123113112221131112311332111213211322211312113211","11131221131211132221232112111312212321123113112221121113122113111231133221121321132132211331121321231231121113122113322113111221131221","31131122211311123113321112131221123113112211121312211213211321322112311311222113311213212322211211131221131211132221232112111312111213111213211231131122212322211331222113112211","1321132132211331121321231231121113112221121321132122311211131122211211131221131211132221121321132132212321121113121112133221123113112221131112311332111213122112311311123112111331121113122112132113213211121332212311322113212221","","","","","","","","","","",""
        };
        return arr[n];        
    }
};
```

```Java [sol2-Java]
class Solution {
    public String countAndSay(int n) {
        String[] arr = {
            "","1","11","21","1211","111221","312211","13112221","1113213211","31131211131221","13211311123113112211","11131221133112132113212221","3113112221232112111312211312113211","1321132132111213122112311311222113111221131221","11131221131211131231121113112221121321132132211331222113112211","311311222113111231131112132112311321322112111312211312111322212311322113212221","132113213221133112132113311211131221121321131211132221123113112221131112311332111213211322211312113211","11131221131211132221232112111312212321123113112221121113122113111231133221121321132132211331121321231231121113122113322113111221131221","31131122211311123113321112131221123113112211121312211213211321322112311311222113311213212322211211131221131211132221232112111312111213111213211231131122212322211331222113112211","1321132132211331121321231231121113112221121321132122311211131122211211131221131211132221121321132132212321121113121112133221123113112221131112311332111213122112311311123112111331121113122112132113213211121332212311322113212221","","","","","","","","","","",""
        };
        return arr[n];
    }
}
```

```C# [sol2-C#]
public class Solution {
    public string CountAndSay(int n) {
        string[] arr = {
            "","1","11","21","1211","111221","312211","13112221","1113213211","31131211131221","13211311123113112211","11131221133112132113212221","3113112221232112111312211312113211","1321132132111213122112311311222113111221131221","11131221131211131231121113112221121321132132211331222113112211","311311222113111231131112132112311321322112111312211312111322212311322113212221","132113213221133112132113311211131221121321131211132221123113112221131112311332111213211322211312113211","11131221131211132221232112111312212321123113112221121113122113111231133221121321132132211331121321231231121113122113322113111221131221","31131122211311123113321112131221123113112211121312211213211321322112311311222113311213212322211211131221131211132221232112111312111213111213211231131122212322211331222113112211","1321132132211331121321231231121113112221121321132122311211131122211211131221131211132221121321132132212321121113121112133221123113112221131112311332111213122112311311123112111331121113122112132113213211121332212311322113212221","","","","","","","","","","",""
        };
        return arr[n];
    }
}
```

```Python [sol2-Python3]
class Solution:
    def countAndSay(self, n: int) -> str:
        arr = ["","1","11","21","1211","111221","312211","13112221","1113213211","31131211131221","13211311123113112211","11131221133112132113212221","3113112221232112111312211312113211","1321132132111213122112311311222113111221131221","11131221131211131231121113112221121321132132211331222113112211","311311222113111231131112132112311321322112111312211312111322212311322113212221","132113213221133112132113311211131221121321131211132221123113112221131112311332111213211322211312113211","11131221131211132221232112111312212321123113112221121113122113111231133221121321132132211331121321231231121113122113322113111221131221","31131122211311123113321112131221123113112211121312211213211321322112311311222113311213212322211211131221131211132221232112111312111213111213211231131122212322211331222113112211","1321132132211331121321231231121113112221121321132122311211131122211211131221131211132221121321132132212321121113121112133221123113112221131112311332111213122112311311123112111331121113122112132113213211121332212311322113212221","","","","","","","","","","",""]
        return arr[n]
```

```JavaScript [sol2-JavaScript]
var countAndSay = function(n) {
    const arr = [
        "","1","11","21","1211","111221","312211","13112221","1113213211","31131211131221","13211311123113112211","11131221133112132113212221","3113112221232112111312211312113211","1321132132111213122112311311222113111221131221","11131221131211131231121113112221121321132132211331222113112211","311311222113111231131112132112311321322112111312211312111322212311322113212221","132113213221133112132113311211131221121321131211132221123113112221131112311332111213211322211312113211","11131221131211132221232112111312212321123113112221121113122113111231133221121321132132211331121321231231121113122113322113111221131221","31131122211311123113321112131221123113112211121312211213211321322112311311222113311213212322211211131221131211132221232112111312111213111213211231131122212322211331222113112211","1321132132211331121321231231121113112221121321132122311211131122211211131221131211132221121321132132212321121113121112133221123113112221131112311332111213122112311311123112111331121113122112132113213211121332212311322113212221","","","","","","","","","","",""
    ];
    return arr[n];
};
```

```go [sol2-Golang]
var arr = []string{"", "1", "11", "21", "1211", "111221", "312211", "13112221", "1113213211", "31131211131221", "13211311123113112211", "11131221133112132113212221", "3113112221232112111312211312113211", "1321132132111213122112311311222113111221131221", "11131221131211131231121113112221121321132132211331222113112211", "311311222113111231131112132112311321322112111312211312111322212311322113212221", "132113213221133112132113311211131221121321131211132221123113112221131112311332111213211322211312113211", "11131221131211132221232112111312212321123113112221121113122113111231133221121321132132211331121321231231121113122113322113111221131221", "31131122211311123113321112131221123113112211121312211213211321322112311311222113311213212322211211131221131211132221232112111312111213111213211231131122212322211331222113112211", "1321132132211331121321231231121113112221121321132122311211131122211211131221131211132221121321132132212321121113121112133221123113112221131112311332111213122112311311123112111331121113122112132113213211121332212311322113212221", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", ""}

func countAndSay(n int) string {
    return arr[n]
}
```

**复杂度分析**

- 时间复杂度：*O(1)*。

- 空间复杂度：![O(C\timesM) ](./p__O_C_times_M__.png) 。其中 *C* 是 *N* 是上界，在本题中 *C = 30*，*M* 为生成的字符串中的最大长度。
